name: The City That Drowned
description:
An abandoned city rising out of the ocean, and silence but the sound of the crashing waves. Can you uncover the secrets of this place, and discover what really happened to the city that drowned? 

{This is the first chapter of a game currently in development.}

The City That Drowned is the first game I've ever made, and I'm very excited to share it with you! It was made in 14 days and mostly the work of one person (me!) (although I had a friend make the music for me).

It was made for charlmes's Game Jam; "I Can't Draw But I Really Want To Make A Game" and I hope the terrible artwork I present you with in this game speaks for itself!

Enjoy, and please feel free to tell me what you think of it, even if it's criticism! Being my first game , I have lot of room for improvement!

Thanks for checking it out!

- Kat
